participant_1.background:
I remember running around in the woods with my siblings, getting lost and having to find our way back home.
I miss the weather in my old hometown, but I'm starting to appreciate the change of seasons here.
I love playing with my husky.
i paddle board on my days off.
I need my morning coffee to make it through the day at work.

participant_2.background:
I don't have much to show for myself, but my Impala is my pride and joy.
I am a memory buff who loves to learn new things and keep my mind sharp.
i am a happy person.
i love to dance.
i just lost my job and i m looking for something new.

content.text: Hello, what do you like to do on your days off?
Hi there! I like to dance and hang out with friends.
Nice! I like to paddle board on my days off. Do you have any hobbies?
I love to learn new things and keep my mind sharp. I am a memory buff!
That is so cool! I wish I had a better memory. Do you have any pets?
I have a husky! He is my pride and joy.
Aw, huskies are so cute! I used to have a husky and a golden retriever.
That sounds like a fun time! What did you like to do with them?
We would go for walks in the woods, play fetch in the park, and cuddle up on the couch.
That sounds so relaxing! I love cuddling up with my dog on the couch.
Me too! Dogs are the best.
